hi all: I just installed ubuntu and when I was running off of the live cd I allowed it to use the unsupported X driver.  Now X won't start.  Within xorg.conf, how do I change it back to the default driver?
sorry, I meant that I enabled the unsupported ATI driver and don't know what to change in xorg.conf to set it back.
just disable it in the unsupported driver manager thing, then run "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
